InvoiceBatchRunRecovery.name: InvoiceBatchRunRecovery
InvoiceBatchRunRecovery.description: Represents information about the recovery procedure of an invoice batch run.

Comments.description: Additional notes or comments for the invoice batch run recovery.

CompletionTime.description: The timestamp when the invoice batch run recovery finished processing.

InvoiceBatchRunId.description: Required. A unique identifier of the invoice batch run that's related to this recovery run.

InvoiceBatchRunRecoveryNumber.description: Required. A unique identifier of the recovery process for the invoice batch run.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed an invoice batch run recovery record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed an invoice batch run recovery record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that the user only accessed the invoice batch run recovery record or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the invoice batch run recovery record itself.

StartTime.description: Required. The timestamp when the invoice batch run recovery started processing.

Status.description: Required. The final state of the recovery process for the invoice batch runs.
